site.title: Crypto Validation
site.description: Timeline and repercussions of Hungarian cryptocurrency "validation" laws

home.title: Crypto Validation - Timeline of Hungarian Crypto Laws
home.description: Detailed documentation of changes and consequences of Hungary's cryptocurrency "validation" law.

about.title: About - Crypto Validation
about.description: Learn about changes in Hungarian cryptocurrency regulation and their consequences.

hero.title: Hungarian crypto owners are at risk
hero.description: The "crypto validation" law is forcing service providers out of Hungary. Crypto owners may lose access to their assets.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Crypto Validation is a citizen-led initiative created to raise awareness about Hungary's "crypto validation" law. Our mission is to inform Hungarian citizens about this legislation, which threatens financial freedom and digital security by mandating globally unique validation requirements on cryptocurrency transactions.
mission.privacy: We believe that financial freedom is a fundamental right, and that maintaining free competition among crypto service providers is essential for protecting the interests of Hungarian crypto owners. The crypto validation law undermines these protections, exposing citizens to new risks and forcing service providers to leave the country.
mission.platform: Our platform provides easy-to-understand information about the crypto validation law, tracks service provider status, and helps citizens contact their representatives to express their concerns.
mission.disclaimer: We are not affiliated with any political party.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions, corrections, clarifications, update requests, or feedback, please reach out:

impact.title: You Are Impacted
impact.description: This regulation affects not just service providers, but every Hungarian crypto owner directly.

zero_compliant.title: Zero Compliant
zero_compliant.description: No exchange can achieve compliance because the requirements are unclear. Despite government claims, service providers continue to leave.

stricter_than_mica.title: Stricter Than MiCA
stricter_than_mica.description: The EU's MiCA regulation does not require this type of validation. There is no explanation for why Hungary needs stricter rules.

criminal.title: Criminal Liability
criminal.description: Violating the regulation can result in criminal prosecution, not just administrative sanctions.

unique_validator.title: Unique Requirement
unique_validator.description: The 'validator' concept does not exist anywhere else in the world. Hungary alone introduced this burden.

private_monopoly.title: Private Monopoly
private_monopoly.description: Validation is handled by a single privately owned company, Caduceus. An allegedly 'important' public interest task is now a private monopoly.

individual_punishment.title: Individual Punishment
individual_punishment.description: The law does not just regulate service providers—it punishes individual crypto owners too.

exchanges.title: Service Providers
exchanges.description: Status of crypto service providers in Hungary.
